downloadTitle: Tree-reweighted message passing algorithm for energy minimization
downloadDescription: This software implements two algorithms for minimizing energy functions of discrete variables with unary and pairwise terms. Last published: November 28, 2006.
detailsSection: This software implements two algorithms for minimizing energy functions of discrete variables with unary and pairwise terms. Such energy functions commonly occur in computer vision. The two algorithms are max-product belief propagation (BP, Pearl'88) and sequential tree-reweighted max-product message passing (TRW-S, Kolmogorov'05).
